text: The 2015 Herefordshire Council election took place on 7 May 2015 to elect all members of the Herefordshire Council in England. It was held on the same day as other local elections. ==References== Category:2015 English local elections Category:May 2015 events in the United Kingdom 2015 Category:21st century in Herefordshire
title: 2015 Herefordshire Council election
